author: ebrondol
body:
This PR migrates the Phase2 iterative tracking customization from `phase2TkTilted/phase2TkFlat` to `trackingPhase2PU140` era. The transition has been done trying to not have any difference respect to the customization function. The comparison with before and after era does not show any significant difference in the MTV plots using TTbar sample for both [flat](http://ebrondol.web.cern.ch/ebrondol/Phase2Tracking/MovingToEra/13July/TTbar_Flat/plots_ootb/effandfake1.pdf) and [tilted](http://ebrondol.web.cern.ch/ebrondol/Phase2Tracking/MovingToEra/13July/TTbar_Tilted/plots_ootb/effandfake1.pdf) geometry.
Next steps are:
- Integrating `duplicateMerge` in  the Validation part (there is a FIXME [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_8_1_X...ebrondol:trackingPhase2_eraMigration_81X#diff-aadf335934a95c465835668d66744a38R37))
- Moving `layerList` to `PixelLayerTriplets.layerList` (there is a FIXME [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_8_1_X...ebrondol:trackingPhase2_eraMigration_81X#diff-f008ec4cef4654fe8e8e19358685f3cdR27))
- Migrate rest of `phase2TkTilted/phase2TkFlat` to eras

No difference is expected also for phase0/1 iterative tracking.

Thanks to @makortel for the precious help.
Informing @VinInn @rovere @delaere @boudoul 
@kpedro88 if possible in pre9.
title: First part of the migration to era for phase2 tracking
